channel.title: Evolution-Scape Team (Recruiting)
channel.description:
Well I was tired of coding by myself all the time.....So i decided to make a Team on Marc 4th 2008. I will be getting Webclient and Webservers up soon. I still need coders, gfx designers, and people with experience it Webservers so if you are interested fill it out [code]Application for: experience: Show some work you have done: How long have you done it for: Why you want to be on the team:[/code]
I have my own hosting site and will be messing around with it tring to host the Webserver....Our server base is Zdaddyreloaded (or whatever its called will edit when i find the real name) I also will be making a site totally for this project...I am a good coder when it comes to websites...so we will have a real nice website...my msn is enzroc21@hotmail.com i am almost always on and if you want to join you can contact me there, on this topic, or in Private messaging.

item.title: Evolution-Scape Team (Recruiting)

item.description:
@enzroc wrote:

Well I was tired of coding by myself all the time…So i decided to make a Team on Marc 4th 2008. I will be getting Webclient and Webservers up soon. I still need coders, gfx designers, and people with experience it Webservers so if you are interested fill it out

Application for: experience: Show some work you have done: How long have you done it for: Why you want to be on the team:
